ServiceWorkerGlobalScopeNotificationclos.summary: The notificationclose event fires when a user closes a displayed notification spawned by .

remarks.para:
Notifications created on the main thread or in workers which aren't service workers
using the constructor will
instead receive a event on the Notification object
itself.

blockquote.para:
Note: Trying to create a notification inside the
using the
constructor will throw an
error.

remarks.para: This event is not cancelable and does not bubble.
